safeguarding_leave_programme_data.msg: Staying in ParentText helps you and your child. Are you sure you want to exit the programme?

If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type "EXIT".

If you made a mistake, please type "BACK".
safeguarding_leave_programme_data.metadata.description:
BACK needs to be consistent with "back_option"
EXIT needs to be consistent with "leave_option"
needs to be consistent with "confirm" message
needs to be consistent with "confirm" message

safeguarding_leave_programme_data.msg:
Thank you for participating. If you want to return to the programme, type HELLO. 

We hope to see you again soon!
safeguarding_leave_programme_data.metadata.description: HELLO is just to suggest something to type, but anything typed in the chat will trigger the same behaviour

safeguarding_leave_programme_data.msg: We are so glad you want to stick around! We will resume your progress tomorrow.

safeguarding_start_programme_data.msg: You are already part of ParentText!
Please type {MENU} to access resources and review completed modules, {PLAY} to receive a playful activity you can complete with your child, or {HELP} to access local support resources for a crisis.

safeguarding_entry_data.question: Are you currently facing an emergency?
safeguarding_entry_data.intro: Here are the contact details of your local emergency services:
safeguarding_entry_data.no_message: Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines. Remember everything you say will be completely private!

safeguarding_entry_data.question: Do you need some support with an emotional issue?
safeguarding_entry_data.intro: If you ever feel like talking privately to a trained professional, you can call:
safeguarding_entry_data.no_message: Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines. Remember everything you say will be completely private!

safeguarding_entry_data.question: Are you currently experiencing a health issue?
safeguarding_entry_data.intro: Here are the contact details of your local medical services:
safeguarding_entry_data.no_message: Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines. Remember everything you say will be completely private!

safeguarding_entry_data.question: Are you experiencing an unsafe situation?
safeguarding_entry_data.intro: If you ever feel like talking privately to a trained professional, you can call:
safeguarding_entry_data.no_message: Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines. Remember everything you say will be completely private!

safeguarding_entry_data.question: Do you have an emergency?
safeguarding_entry_data.intro: Here are the contact details of your local emergency services:
safeguarding_entry_data.no_message: Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines. Remember everything you say will be completely private!

safeguarding_entry_data.question: Do you need some urgent help?
safeguarding_entry_data.intro: If you ever feel like talking privately to a trained professional, you can call:
safeguarding_entry_data.no_message: Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines. Remember everything you say will be completely private!

safeguarding_wfr_interaction_data.msg: Would you like to go back to the previous messages?
That's okay. Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines.

referrals.intro: Please look after yourself! Your local clinic can help you with all health issues. If you need more support, here are some free helplines:
Seeing and experiencing violence can be a scary and confusing time. There are people who can help you and your child through this!
Feeling sad or stressed, or your child's behaviour is difficult? These places can help you:

Family life is difficult! Did you know the social workers at your local Department of Social Development can help with parenting skills, fatherhood, teenage pregnancy, and family and relationship counselling? If you don't have a DSD office nearby, this support will be offered by NGOs in your area:
So much of our energy goes to helping the person struggling with substance abuse. While this is important, you and the rest of the family need support too! Find support for everyone below:
Legal and SASSA issues can be stressful and confusing! There might be more support than you realise at the organisations below:
Understanding sexual and gender development can be confusing and difficult to talk about. We are all unique! Here is some support and guidance:
School is where your child spends most of their time. Making sure that they are in school, and happy and supported is so important. If you're struggling with any school issues, here is some help:

safeguarding_help_data.msg: I might know some resources that can help. What would you like information for?
I’m sorry that I cannot help with your challenge. If you want to access this information again, you can type {HELP} at any time.
What would you like to do?
We hope this was helpful! You can access this information at any time by typing {HELP}.

uncaught_message_flow_data.msg:
I don't understand your message.
Please type {MENU} to access resources and review completed modules, {PLAY} to receive a playful activity you can complete with your child, or {HELP} to access local support resources for a crisis.
You have not given consent to participate in this programme. Would you like to participate?

If you ever decide to participate in the programme, type HELLO. 
We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!
Parenting is hard. ParentText may help. Would you like to continue your progress?

That's okay. If you ever decide to come back, type HELLO. 
We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!
